name: dlflow
description: DLFlow - 智能数据处理Web平台

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run python main.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules api/node_modules frontend/dist api/dist
